project_abstract.cdata: The principal items to be financed by the proposed loan are 410 kms of track, 110 ballast cars and track maintenance equipment, workshop equipment and tools, parts for passenger cars, rail cars and freight cars, freight handling equipment, telecommunications equipment, signalling and other railway material, and consulting services. All contracts proposed for bank financing will be awarded on the basis of international competitive bidding. The bulk of the orders are expected to be placed in the United States, Western Europe and Japan.
